page.title: 02RESIDENTS IN NORTH/ELTON
page.content:
The bottom left-hand square of our block covers part of the village of Elton. The village is an old stone-built development on the A650. There are some old houses, but there have also been several developments of new housing, and we thought it would be interesting to find out a little about the people who have chosen to make Elton their home.
We called at every household in River Lane, Duck Street, Hayes Walk, Brown Way, Faber Close and Wansford Road at various times of the day during late August and early September and got 27 answer sheets. The results of our questions are shown on the following pages.
